question: 懇意
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>idea</kanji> of being <kanji>courteous</kanji> leads you to have more feelings of <vocabulary>intimacy</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>kindness</vocabulary> toward people. The more courteous someone is toward you (and vice versa), the more the <vocabulary>closeness</vocabulary> between the two of you grows.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
